We can verify this in simple cpp.

#include <iostream>

int main(){
    ptrdiff_t size = (ptrdiff_t) (((0.45 - 0.1) / 0.05) + 1);
    std::cout << size << std::endl;
    size  = (ptrdiff_t) ((0.45 / 0.05 - 0.1 / 0.05) + 1);
    std::cout << size << std::endl;
    return 0;
}
